meanings.sent1: The hotel suite was superluxury with its plush furnishings.
meanings.sent2: She felt like a princess in the superluxury gown.
meanings.sent3: The superluxury car had a built-in massage chair!
meanings.sent4: The superluxury yacht sailed gracefully on the crystal-clear waters.
meanings.sent5: The superluxury vacation home was like a dream come true.

meanings.definition: A super luxurious item or experience.
meanings.sent1: The superluxury of the private jet made travel effortless.
meanings.sent2: Staying at the superluxury resort was a once-in-a-lifetime experience.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his pet's superluxury bed was nicer than his own!
meanings.sent4: The superluxury of the spa day rejuvenated her like magic.
meanings.sent5: The superluxury of the cruise ship made her feel like royalty.
